macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Markets Close Higher with Dow Up 0.62%, NASDAQ Up 0.88%
items.summary: Major US indices ended positively on January 22, 2026: Dow Jones rose 0.62% to 49,405, NASDAQ up 0.88% to 23,450, and S&P 500 up 0.55% to 6,913.35 amid positive investor sentiment and after Trump called off tariffs on European countries.

items.title: Bank of Japan Keeps Key Interest Rate Unchanged at 0.75%
items.summary: The Bank of Japan held its policy rate steady as expected, slightly upgrading inflation and growth forecasts; Asian markets gained modestly with Nikkei 225 up 0.2% to 53,800 and Hang Seng up 0.3%.

items.title: Indian Markets Open Green: Nifty 50 Up 0.22%, Sensex Up 0.03%
items.summary: Indian stock markets opened higher on January 23, 2026, shaking off tariff and geopolitical fears; pharma sector eyes growth from reduced drug approval review periods, with key earnings from IndusInd Bank, Cipla ahead.

items.title: Commodities Surge: Silver Up 2.30%, Gold Up 0.80%, Crude Oil +0.66%
items.summary: Commodity markets showed strong gains with silver at +2.30% to $98.59, gold +0.80% to $4,952.50, and crude oil +0.66% to $59.75; natural gas dipped 1.37%.

items.title: JPMorgan Chase Stock Rises Amid Trump Lawsuit
items.summary: JPMorgan Chase shares gained 0.5% following a lawsuit by former President Trump accusing the bank of closing his accounts for political reasons after 2021.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Struggles to Hold $90,000 as Exchange Inflows Surge
items.summary: Bitcoin failed to maintain gains above $90,000 following unprecedented exchange inflows of 16,653 BTC over Tuesday and Wednesday, with analysts comparing the pattern to market tops from July and August 2025.

items.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Options Expire with Bullish Sentiment
items.summary: Bitcoin options worth $1.9 billion expire with a max pain price of $92,000 and put/call ratio of 0.81, while Ethereum options valued at $347 million expire with a max pain price of $3,200.

items.title: Coinbase Launches Quantum Computing Advisory Board
items.summary: Coinbase announced the formation of a quantum computing advisory board to explore the impact of quantum technology on blockchain security.

items.title: U.S. Crypto Regulation Delayed as Senate Shifts Priorities
items.summary: The Senate Banking Committee is expected to delay the CLARITY Act until late February or March as it focuses on President Trump's affordability agenda, including restrictions on Wall Street investment in single-family homes.

items.title: XRP Holds Support Near $1.90 Despite Declining Retail Sentiment
items.summary: XRP maintained support near $1.90 amid deteriorating retail sentiment, with analysts suggesting potential for a positive breakout in coming months.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Empirical Study Uncovers Major Security Risks in Machine Learning Model-Sharing Platforms
items.summary: Researchers from University of Notre Dame and IQVIA revealed significant remote code execution vulnerabilities in platforms like Hugging Face, which hosts 2.1 million models as of January 2026. The study used static analysis tools to identify security flaws, urging automated scanning and better sandboxing amid daily model additions.

items.title: Female-Dominated Careers Most Exposed to AI Disruption with Low Adaptive Capacity
items.summary: Brookings Institution analysis shows 6.1 million US workers in high AI exposure roles, particularly female-dominated ones, face low adaptability due to factors like age and finances. Occupations like lawyers and developers are better positioned despite exposure.

items.title: Maybank Announces $2.5 Billion Investment in AI, Data, and Technology Over Five Years
items.summary: Malayan Banking Berhad (Maybank) plans MYR 10 billion investment to optimize productivity with AI and machine learning, enhance customer experiences via personalization, and modernize core banking for growth beyond 2030.

items.title: Keysight Launches Machine Learning Toolkit to Accelerate PDK Development
items.summary: Keysight Technologies introduced a Machine Learning Toolkit to speed up device modeling and Process Design Kit (PDK) development in semiconductor design.

items.title: AI Chip Market Projected to Reach $223.94 Billion by 2030 with 41.1% CAGR
items.summary: The artificial intelligence chip market is expected to grow from $40.21 billion in 2025 to $56.48 billion in 2026 at a 40.4% CAGR, driven by demand for advanced computing.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Fighting Force Collection Released Today
items.summary: The Fighting Force Collection, a compilation of the classic 3D beat 'em ups Fighting Force (1997) and Fighting Force 2 (1999), launches today with co-op gameplay support.

items.title: Fable Gameplay Trailer Showcases New Features
items.summary: Playground Games has released the first gameplay trailer for Fable, showing off mechanics like chicken kicking and other gameplay elements ahead of its 2026 release.

items.title: Super Mario Bros. Wonder Switch 2 Edition Announced for March 26
items.summary: Nintendo announced Super Mario Bros. Wonder: Nintendo Switch 2 Edition with a massive multiplayer expansion featuring 12-player lobbies, playable Rosalina, and hardware-specific features launching March 26.

items.title: Notable Video Game Releases Scheduled for January and February 2026
items.summary: Major releases include Code Vein 2 (January 30), Nioh 3 (February 5), Star Trek Voyager Across the Unknown (February 19), and Resident Evil Requiem (February 27) across multiple platforms.

items.title: Defeating Games for Charity Marathon Underway
items.summary: The third annual Defeating Games for Charity video game marathon is running this weekend (January 23-25) on Twitch to raise funds for the Video Game History Foundation.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Apple Training Next-Gen Siri on Google's AI Chips
items.summary: Apple is reportedly shifting AI training for conversational Siri models to Google's TPUs, signaling a major shift in Big Tech alliances as compute access becomes critical for product development.

items.title: Google Workspace for Education Adds Security Features
items.summary: Google Workspace for Education now includes ransomware detection and synthetic-content checks to enhance security for educational institutions.

items.title: Ethernovia Raises $90M for Ethernet-Based Chip Technology
items.summary: Chip startup Ethernovia secured $90 million in funding to develop Ethernet-based chips designed for low-latency data movement in autonomous systems, vehicles, and robotics.

items.title: UK Regulators Crack Down on Deepfake Technologies
items.summary: UK regulators are implementing new measures to combat harmful deepfake technologies spreading online.

items.title: U.S. Tightens Oversight on Advanced Chip Exports
items.summary: New U.S. legislation is restricting exports of advanced chips, reflecting growing government involvement in technology supply chain control.

items.title: Canada Preparing for 6G Networks Despite Years Away
items.summary: Leading researchers indicate 6G technology could enable high-speed cell service across Canada, with the country already beginning preparations for the next-generation network technology.
